column4: Hello ! I have this message when i try to install a package in terminal : "E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable) E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?"
tlucal : I install the systeml yesterday. When i put for exemple "sudo apt-get install XXX"
check synaptic isn't open, that you are doing any updates, or you have another apt-get process going.
